service.name: PTC
service.description: The PRACE Training Centres (PTCs) provide top-class education and training opportunities for computational scientists in Europe and are the primary source for PRACE training portal materials.
service.providers: Four PRACE members sites: IT4I – IT4Innovations National Supercomputing Center (Czech Republic), GRNET – Greek Research and Technology Network (Greece), ICHEC – Irish Centre for High-End Computing (Ireland), SURFsara (The Netherlands)
